text: Thore Christian Elias Fries (3 November 1886 – 31 December 1930 son of Theodor Magnus Fries and brother of Robert Elias Fries) was Professor of Systematic Botany at Lund University. He specialized in lichenology and plant geography. This botanist is denoted by the author abbreviation T.C.E.Fr. when citing a botanical name. He did his field work and travelled in India and Africa He was a member of the British Mycological Society and associated with many botanical gardens and other museums. ==References== *Systematic Botany - History at www.systbot.uu.se *http://www.systbot.uu.se/information/history/fries. ==External links== * Category:Botanists with author abbreviations Category:1886 births Category:1930 deaths Fries, Robert Elias Fries, Robert Elias Category:Swedish botanists Category:Burials at Uppsala old cemetery
title: Thore Christian Elias Fries
